_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Astroneer
author: imkringle@proton.me
description: A game of aerospace industry and interplanetary exploration. - Based on https://github.com/JoeJoeTV/AstroTuxLauncher

installation.script:
#AstroTuxLauncher Install Script
#Made for Astroneer
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

## Pull TuxLauncher Repoo
GIT_ADDRESS="https://github.com/JoeJoeTV/AstroTuxLauncher.git"
if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo -e "/mnt/server directory is not empty."
    if [ -d .git ]; then
        echo -e ".git directory exists"
        if [ -f .git/config ]; then
            echo -e "loading info from git config"
            ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        else
            echo -e "files found with no git config"
            echo -e "closing out without touching things to not break anything"
            exit 10
        fi
    fi
    if [ "${ORIGIN}" == "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
        echo "pulling latest from github"
        git pull
    fi
else
    echo -e "/mnt/server is empty.\ncloning files into repo"
    if [ -z ${BRANCH} ]; then
        echo -e "cloning default branch"
        git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    fi
fi

#Pull required configs
CONFIG_DIR="/mnt/server/AstroneerServer/Astro/Saved/Config/WindowsServer"
ASTRO_INI="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ImKringle/Ptero-Things/update-tux/Games-Eggs/SteamCMD-Games/astrotuxlauncher/AstroServerSettings.ini"
mkdir -p "$CONFIG_DIR" && cd "$CONFIG_DIR"
if [ ! -f AstroServerSettings.ini ]; then
    curl -sSL "$ENGINE_INI"
else
    echo "Config files already exist. Skipping download"
fi


## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "AstroTuxLauncher Install completed...    "
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Network Check
variables.description: Whether to check the network configuration for any problems. Generally unneeded.

variables.name: Debug Logging
variables.description: Wether to output debug messages (Warning: Highly increased output)

variables.name: Disable Encryption
variables.description: Whether to force disable encryption for the Dedicated Server. Required as of now.

variables.name: Auto Save
variables.description: Autosave Interval in Seconds. Recommended is 900
